email_chain.subject: Freight Offer for Coal Shipment: MV OCEAN STAR
email_chain.body:
Dear John,

I hope this message finds you well. We are pleased to offer a freight rate for the shipment of 25,000MT of Coal from Newcastle to Shanghai under CIF terms. The vessel proposed is MV OCEAN STAR, with a DWT of 82,000 and LOA of 225m.

Our initial freight quote is USD 28.50 per metric ton. The laycan is set for October 20 to October 25, 2023. Please let us know your thoughts or if you require any further details.

Best regards,
Laura Smith
Maritime Brokers

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Offer for Coal Shipment: MV OCEAN STAR
email_chain.body:
Hi Laura,

Thank you for the offer. The rate seems reasonable, but we are looking to secure a more competitive rate given the current market conditions. Could you consider lowering the freight to USD 27.00 per metric ton?

Additionally, could you confirm the demurrage rate and laytime details?

Best regards,
John Doe
Charterers Inc.

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Offer for Coal Shipment: MV OCEAN STAR
email_chain.body:
Dear John,

Thank you for your response. After reviewing your request, we can offer a revised freight rate of USD 27.50 per metric ton. The demurrage rate is set at USD 15,000 per day, and the laytime is 72 hours.

Please confirm if this revised offer meets your expectations.

Best regards,
Laura Smith
Maritime Brokers

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Offer for Coal Shipment: MV OCEAN STAR
email_chain.body:
Hi Laura,

Thank you for the revised offer. We can agree to the USD 27.50 per metric ton, provided the laycan is strictly adhered to. Could you confirm the loading and discharge windows?

Best regards,
John Doe
Charterers Inc.

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Offer for Coal Shipment: MV OCEAN STAR
email_chain.body:
Dear John,

I confirm that the laycan will be strictly adhered to, with loading at Newcastle from October 20 to October 25 and discharge at Shanghai within 10 days of departure. There are no anticipated delays at this stage.

Please let me know if you need any further clarifications.

Best regards,
Laura Smith
Maritime Brokers

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Offer for Coal Shipment: MV OCEAN STAR - Confirmation
email_chain.body:
Hi Laura,

Thank you for the confirmation. We agree to the terms and will proceed with the booking. Please send over the contract for review.

Best regards,
John Doe
Charterers Inc.
